name: projects.tags.beta
description: Project Tags (BETA) denote project capability exclusive to the beta tier and are only configurable by a Facility Operator

api_endpoints.description: GET: List of Projects Tags options using optional 'search' parameter
PATCH: overwrite Projects Tags when found in request body

key_value_pairs.beta.NoLimitCPU: allows to create VMs with X CPUs or more
key_value_pairs.beta.NoLimitRAM: allows to create VMs with X GB of RAM or more
key_value_pairs.beta.NoLimitDisk: allows to create VMs with X GB of disk or more
